name: gestion-factures
description: Application de gestion de factures et devis (Electron + React + Node)
author: Khalil Jaouani

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONT,ELECTRON -c cyan,green "npm run dev:front" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build:backend:deps: npm --prefix backend ci --omit=dev || npm --prefix backend install --omit=dev
scripts.clean: rimraf dist release_* release_debug out start.log
scripts.build:dir: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:deps && electron-builder --dir --config.directories.output=release_debug
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:deps && electron-builder --win nsis --x64 --publish never --config.directories.output=dist
scripts.dist:portable: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:deps && electron-builder --win portable --x64 --publish never --config.directories.output=dist
